title: MCTS-Reasoning: Monte Carlo Tree Search for LLM Reasoning
description: A canonical Monte Carlo Tree Search implementation for LLM-based step-by-step reasoning. Explores multiple reasoning paths to find high-quality solutions using UCB1 exploration-exploitation balance, tree-building rollouts, and optional MCP tool integration.
